Name: Drones, The Human Condition
About the game: In 2084 Cloud 9 the world government body perfected armed AI Drones, a cloud controlled advanced robot species created from bio-mechanical material traded with alien races who influence power on earth. Guided by their infallible logic, the drones conclude: 'the human race is draining the earth's resources and therefore must be imprisoned and destroyed'. You can save Humanity! Nostalgic arcade style gameplay, 13 levels of chaotic destruction, Original adrenaline-pumping electronic sound track, Secrets to uncover, Achievements, Trading Cards, Full gamepad support.
